statements: SELECT * FROM lighting_control_schedule;
SELECT room_name, light_intensity, time_start, time_end FROM lighting_control_schedule WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT room_name, light_intensity FROM lighting_control_schedule WHERE time_start = '08:00:00';
SELECT id, room_name, time_start, time_end, days_of_week FROM lighting_control_schedule WHERE light_intensity > 50;
SELECT id, user_id, room_name FROM lighting_control_schedule ORDER BY room_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM lighting_control_schedule WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT room_name, light_intensity, time_start FROM lighting_control_schedule WHERE room_name = 'Living Room' AND light_intensity > 50 ORDER BY time_start DESC
SELECT DISTINCT room_name FROM lighting_control_schedule WHERE days_of_week @> ARRAY['Monday']
SELECT * FROM lighting_control_schedule WHERE light_intensity BETWEEN 50 AND 80 AND time_start >= '08:00:00' AND time_end <= '18:00:00'
SELECT id, room_name, time_start, time_end FROM lighting_control_schedule WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY room_name ASC, time_start ASC
SELECT * FROM schedule ORDER BY start_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, user_id FROM schedule WHERE light_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, start_time FROM schedule WHERE end_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_preferences ORDER BY preferred_start_time ASC;
SELECT id, end_time FROM schedule WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT id, user_id, light_id, start_time, end_time FROM schedule WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY start_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE preferred_light_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND preferred_start_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_schedules FROM schedule GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_schedules > 3;
SELECT user_id, CASE WHEN preferred_start_time > now() THEN 'Active' ELSE 'Inactive' END AS status FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, preferred_light_id, SUM(DATEDIFF(end_time, start_time)) AS total_time_used FROM schedule GROUP BY user_id, preferred_light_id ORDER BY total_time_used DESC;
SELECT * FROM schedule;
SELECT user_id, start_time, end_time FROM schedule WHERE light_intensity > 0.5;
SELECT user_id, preferred_light_intensity FROM user_preferences;
SELECT group_id, group_name FROM light_groups WHERE group_name = 'Living Room';
SELECT user_id, start_time, end_time FROM schedule ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, start_time, end_time FROM schedule WHERE light_intensity > 0.5 ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, preferred_light_intensity FROM user_preferences WHERE preferred_light_intensity > 0.4;
SELECT group_id, group_name FROM light_groups WHERE group_name LIKE 'Living%';
SELECT schedule_id, user_id, start_time, end_time FROM schedule WHERE light_intensity < 0.3 AND start_time < '2022-01-01';
SELECT u.user_id, u.preferred_start_time, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM user_preferences u INNER JOIN schedule s ON u.user_id = s.user_id ORDER BY u.preferred_start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT light_name, location, status FROM lights WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, light_id, brightness, color_temperature FROM preferences WHERE brightness > 50;
SELECT * FROM schedules ORDER BY start_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE timezone = 'PST';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM schedules WHERE repeat_days LIKE '%Mon%';
SELECT user_id, light_name, location FROM users INNER JOIN lights ON users.user_id = lights.light_id;
SELECT user_id, light_name, brightness, color_temperature FROM preferences INNER JOIN lights ON preferences.light_id = lights.light_id;
SELECT * FROM schedules;
SELECT user_id, start_time, end_time FROM schedules WHERE lighting_control_id=1;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE phone_number='1234567890';
SELECT control_name, intensity, status FROM lighting_controls WHERE intensity > 50;
SELECT event_name, timestamp FROM events ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM schedules
SELECT name, email FROM users ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT schedule_id, start_time, end_time FROM schedules WHERE user_id = 100
SELECT control_name, intensity FROM lighting_controls WHERE status = 'active'
SELECT event_name, timestamp FROM events WHERE status = 'upcoming' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
